page.title: 12PENGWERN FARM,LLANGOLLEN.
page.content: {Pengwern Hall Farm}is situated in Pengwern Vale. The farm is a{dairy}and {sheep}farm and the people who own it have lived there for the last 15 years. There are five workers working on the farm. There are two sons,one boy and the present owners themselves, plus some seasonal labour. There are {152 cattle,700 ewes,7 foals,2 mares {and 20 ponies.}There was a stable which was burnt down recently,which they have had to rebuild. They own{230 {acres}of land. The markets they use are{Mold, Ruthin and Oswestry.}There is a very old{chapel}inside the farm house and it was built about{1300}or perhaps earlier. There is also a beam in the chapel which has the date{1200 on it. Some people even say there is a tunnel from the chapel to{Valle Crucis {Abbey.
